summary: REQ-2 appears implemented by updating the Footer component to use a white background while keeping banana-themed, readable text/icon colors. No evidence in the diff summary of changes to header or main content UI code, and no backend/model changes are shown. Some unrequested documentation/metadata updates were also made.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated documentation/summary content unrelated to the requested footer background change (e.g., HomePage described as using a global cyan background).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to change the footer (bottom bar) background; updating repository summary files and asserting other page background changes is not requested and could conflict with the non-goal of not changing main page backgrounds.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HomePage description: "lower section now using the global cyan background")

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state file updated without a requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating project_state.json; this is an extra change outside REQ-2.
